snippet: During the first round on Thursday night, players paraded in suits in slipcover sizes and footgear like the studded gold pumps worn by one.
abstract: Players at 2015 NFL draft dress stylishly as if for red carpet; biggest fashion statements at 2015 NFL draft include studded gold Christian Louboutin pumps worn by Dante Fowler Jr and sparkling bow tie worn by Cameron Erving.
lead_paragraph: During the first round on Thursday night, players paraded in suits in slipcover sizes and footgear like the studded gold pumps worn by one.

headline.main: At the N.F.L. Draft, Fashion Takes the Field
headline.print_headline: At the N.F.L. Draft, Fashion Takes the Field
